Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: ponywal
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a bit far from the airport but it was a nice place to stay. Good rooms and pretty good breakfast. Just really busy because of the cruises.

Reviews.Title: “Grrrrrreeeeaaaat Value!!! Tremendous Experience”
Reviews.Author: Sylvia G
Reviews.Content: I Booked this hotel, because the location (Close to the Doral Golf Resort & Spa) and it was the Golf Tournament! Just 3 Blocks Away from the Resort, I've been looking of the reviews, shuttle to the airport was perfect, just call to the hotel upon my arrival, and operator Danny (Later on I just found to out he was the Front Operations Manager) put me on hold while he contact the driver Nelson (another 5 stars Employee) To arrange my pick up, I just wait 30 Mins (Enough for my Cigarette). Good Breakfast, Check out was really smooth thanks to Abby (small area for the amount of people) Clean Room, I did have my room on the 3rd Floor, and everything was perfect, Laundry Service, (Not Free) but guys if want to be treated as a friend and that is the place to be!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for 4 days”
Reviews.Author: 2retiredpeople
Reviews.Content: Clean room, great shower, good continental breakfast, shuttle to airport or wherever you want to go, clean lobby, pleasant front desk, free wi-fi. We are a 60 year old retired couple and I've told my husband that I'm done going to creepy hotels to save a buck. Of course we wanted to save a buck so we stayed here and would do it again in a heartbeat. There was public transportation within a 2 minute walk from the hotel and we used it to go downtown everyday. Pay $5 and ride the bus, subway, and people mover all day- what a deal! The Doral Country Club was hosting a PGA tournament and we walked from our hotel to the event. Super convenient and we didn't even know it. Lots of multicultural restaurants and American ones within walking distance or the hotel shuttle will take you there. Even though this hotel is near the airport and you have to travel to see the sights of Miami, you will not be sorry to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: AMMKT
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel due to good reviews on most websites and it's location to the airport. Unfortunately my experience was not as good as of the other reviewers. It was not horrible by all means but I would not be staying or recommending this hotel to any of my friends. The shuttle does collect from the aiport but not at regular intervalls. We called the hotel three times before the shuttle managed to pick us up, twice we were told it'll be approximately 15 minutes and once we were told that he just left the airport (without us). The clark in the evening during check in seem to be out of his depth which did not help this experience. The morning staff was a lot more together and helpful. The hotel was not very accomodating regarding bag storage or late check out (only at half the daily rate for the extra 2 hours we needed)

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE”
Reviews.Author: Bonnie W
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel because of it's location to the airport, it provided a shuttle, the price, breakfast and outdoor pool. We were returning from a cruise. Many other hotels in the area offerred a shuttle from the Port of Miami to the hotel - this one did not. It cost $40 to get to the hotel. We were early and had to wait for a room. The room was adequate, but poorly maintained and smelled of mildew. Our flight out the next morning was 7am - the hotel's shuttle only ran from 6am and they would not accomodate our need to leave earlier - another $25. No restaurant and nearest ones were a good distance to walk, Breakfast was only served from 7am so that was out too. All and all this lousy hotel ended up costing more than a 4 star hotel! Oh, and planes flew in over head almost every 10 - 15 min! great night's sleep!! Not!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Reasonable”
Reviews.Author: KeysLady2
Reviews.Content: Nice room, comfy bed, the bathroom was older, but clean. Breakfast was good and there was lots of choices. Staff was so so. Front desk clerk was rude, but he was very busy. Planie noise is loud and can get annoying.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and fly package”
Reviews.Author: ramrodfl
Reviews.Content: Stay one night and leave your car up to 21 days for free. Free shuttle to and from the airport. Excellent room with king bed, microwave etc. Great rates and discounts with fast service.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel near the airport”
Reviews.Author: Half8
Reviews.Content: Simple, clean hotel with very big room with clean bed linen. The hotel is in a short driving distance from the airport and has very good price as it seems that airport hotel close to Miami are expensive. Internet in the room was not working (or very very slow) that was the negative point about this hotel. The breakfast is really good, with a lot of options, good service. I would recommend this hotel for the prices compared to other structures in the area, cleanness of the room and the complimentary breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid if you can”
Reviews.Author: Barry M
Reviews.Content: This is a very low quality property, albiet with friendly staff, that caters to a lot of foreign nationals and is in a pretty poor area. Do not bring your wife and family here expecting a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “Service, Staff and Building Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Dawn A
Reviews.Content: 2 rooms booked and I couldn't cancel because of non-refundable policy. On our Dec. 31, 2011 we waited for 1 1/2 hours at the airport for the shuttle. Made 4 phone calls to hotel before we finally got picked up. Hotel staff rude when we called, I was traveling with a child and was very unhappy with the service. Schedule 12:30 shuttle to the Port of Miami, waiting in lobby at 12:15 alarm in lobby continously going off (loud). Everyone moved outside to wait, finally after several compliants from numerous guests we were told that they had to borrow a shuttle from another hotel because it was over booked. Finally they arrived at the hotel at 1:15 waited again over an hour, this in return only gave us less than one hour to go through the process of boarding the cruise ship. Shuttles in poor condition. Upon leaving that morning found little spiders all over the tv stand in our room. January 8, 2012 stay was put in room 318. Room smelled moldy and I requested to switch rooms I have an asthmatic child. Moved to room 316, curtains and chair were flithy and stained. Windows don't shut properly window sills dirty and modly. Carpets unvaccumed & stained. Pizza companys getting in secured doorways and putting fliers under room doors throughout the evening. Vending not properly stocked, frontdesk doesnt have proper change for vending. Toilet in room didn't work properly had to have them come plunge it. Very disappointed with whole experience, I was lead to believe that when I booked through my Choice Priveleges that I could assure the quality of the hotels that they have chosen. The license in the elevator was not even licensed in the hotels name. It was licensed in another hotel chain name. Very pissed that I could not cancel my hotel for Jan. date after terrible service on Dec. 31st date because of the non-refundable policy when booking through Choice Priveleges. Due to the ordeal I went through I will not be booking any further hotels through this. I was stuck in a terrible hotel and couldn't switch to a nicer one without losing several hundred dollars. Never again.

Reviews.Title: “Very dissapointed”
Reviews.Author: Lesamel
Reviews.Content: I have always stayed at this hotel going back many years when they were still known as Fairfield Inn. I have got to know the General Manager, Mrs Fernandez. I phoned and spoke to her personally and explained that due to my disability I must have a room with a walk in shower as I can not climb into a bath. Well the room had a walk in shower with a aluminium strip, the tiles were normal glossy and slippery. There is no cord switch if help is needed. They still have a nerve to have a badge on the outside of the door that the room is for disabled! I stayed there in October 2011 and so far she or anyone else has not bothered to contact me to find out if I managed to get home all right or ask me how I am getting on.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel... very busy”
Reviews.Author: NomadGPS
Reviews.Content: In November I traveled with a business partner to Miami for a Show. We found in internet this hotel, the location was great, everything was close enough and we could be moving around the all day... Nice rooms, big enough and clean...

Reviews.Title: “Waste of time”
Reviews.Author: Roland95
Reviews.Content: Prior to taking a cruise on Dec 4th 2011 we had booked a one night stay at this hotel. When we reserved the room we were told that the shuttle would pick us up at the airport. When we arrived we waited one hour then took a taxi to the hotel,(cost $25) only to be told that we had to call for the shuttle on arrival. This was contrary to the info at booking, The room was not bad but we have been in much better. The hotel has no bar and no dining room other than a small local for breakfast.The hotel is located in what appears to be an industrial part of Miami and has no restaurants worthy of the name in the immidiate vicinity. We finally found an Italian restaurant after a 25 minute walk, The hotel clerk advised us that the shuttle for the port of Miami would leave at 9:15 and 12.00 o'clock but that the ship would not commence boarding procedures before 1.00P,M. He reccomended that we take the last shuttle. The same info was given to others at the same time. What a surprise when we arrived at the port to find that boarding had been underway since 10.00A,M and that we were the last to arrive. We therefore lost 3 to 4 hours aboard ship ,time that was spent hanging around the hotel room needlessly, This hotel is definitly not up to standard for a Quality Inn. We will be taking other cruises but we will not be staying at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “J58 Kindness at Quality Inn Miami Airport”
Reviews.Author: J58Judy
Reviews.Content: Hats off to the staff at Quality Inn Miami Airport, I can't say more to the quality of service the staff has provided. From airport pick up till our departure to seaport. Special mention to Fernando who picked us up at the airport and guided, advised us of what is Miami is all about (first time visitor). Since then Fernando is always available for what ever assistance we may require. Another fellow Nelson also took time to pick us up after a day trip to Key West and there was no available taxi from the drop off point. A simple one call to the staff and the helping hand is available. Front Desk staff is amazing, most helpful group of people I ever met in my years of travelling. Keep up the good work and God Bless.

Reviews.Title: “First and Last Visit”
Reviews.Author: AlwynR154992
Reviews.Content: I stayed there recently. Not as pictures appear on Internet. The room is tiny and the Carpet felt dirty. The Front Desk workers should be at the back desk. There was no iron in the room, I requested one and was told I would receive shortly. After 15 minutes I called back to find out where it was. I was told it is at the front desk and no one was there to bring it to my room. When I went there, there were three persons at the front desk. In the night I saw the front desk person having a tracing match with a guest. Customer Service naaa. The Shuttle service was good, likewise breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't ever stay here again”
Reviews.Author: srhonda61
Reviews.Content: The shuttle service from the airport was prompt, as long as you call in, the driver, who was very nice, knows to look for you. However, the place is pretty disgusting. Personally, it's the worst place I've ever been in. Simple is okay, unclean is not. The furniture in the lobby is old and stained, the carpet in the hallways is stained everywhere. We had to change rooms after finding an old hair in the bathtub and pink stuff running down the back of the tub. The floor around the toilet was filthy and there was a stain on the bed...Just gross. This is unlike any other Quality Inn I've ever been to. The place needs a complete overhaul. The bedding is made up of cheap duvets without covers and a strip of coloured fabric at the end of the bed.... Our second room (after a long wait and a first attempt at a second room where the key wouldn't open the door) had a leaky faucet in the bathtub and the plumbing fixtures weren't clean. There were stains on the bathroom floor but it wasn't as bad as the first room. I went to plug my laptop into the wall outlet under the desk and noticed that the carpet looked like it hadn't been vacuumed under there in awhile. The only thing I liked about this place were the pillows and getting the heck out as soon as possible. The area itself is bad. Nowhere decent to grab a meal. We were in a fast food chicken place nearby and the place was just as filthy. The women's bathroom hadn't been cleaned and a tile on the wall looked like it had been punched in. We found out there was a Starbucks down the street but were advised not to walk down there as it could be unsafe....not a good feeling. Obviously, with the above said, I would absolutely not recommend this place to anybody with expectations of basic cleanliness while staying at a hotel. Quality Inn doesn't live up to it's name at this place.

Reviews.Title: “ok if you really have to.”
Reviews.Author: isyns
Reviews.Content: stayed here for one night as wanted to be close to the airport for an early flight. had some difficulty finding it as it is not really on 79th, you have to enter a side street past the marriott and all the way to the back, right next to the freeway. staff at reception weren't that friendly at check-in or check-out but hey, maybe they had a tough day. the room was OK, nothing flash. free wifi was handy and free parking also. missed out on breakfast because of the early flight so can't comment. there isn't much in the area apart from a gas station at the main intersection and a few fast food outlets. it is far from miami beach or sobe so obviously caters to the airport crowd. ok for the money, but i don't think i would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “ok for a quick stay”
Reviews.Author: uriel076
Reviews.Content: I stopped at miami on my flight from punta cana to cancun and lost my connection so american airlines gave me a list of hotels from which i choosed this one cause of the distance from the airport and the fact they have a shuttle every 15 minutes...but i had to wait 35 minutes and only after i went back to teh airline i found out they were using another hotel's shuttle because theirs was broken. The hotel its ok if you realize you are not paying a lot and if its only for a short stay, i have to say the bed is much better than in any sheraton or marriot i have stay, and i have in many of them, its really comfortable and soft with a lot of pillows. The gym its a joke but again its a low rate and if not expecting much more than a resting nite its ok. The shuttle next morning was on time only i almost missed it because the door lock broke and i was trapped for abiut ten minutes before a maid passed in front of my room and i told her cause maintanence never got there after i called.

Reviews.Title: “visit to Miami”
Reviews.Author: travelclub007
Reviews.Content: The rooms were good, breakfast was good and we enjoyed the pool. Great stay at a good price. Do recomend this hotel. It was the week of July 4th, 2011. Nice and hot.

Reviews.Title: “Lost property and downright rude staff...very disappointing.”
Reviews.Author: Rperry1988
Reviews.Content: Stayed here twice in a week due to location. Never felt valued by staff whatsoever. Arrived to airport, rang hotel many times but took roughly 20mins to answer the phone...beware of answering machine. Tranfers were good if you are prepared to wait. On my first visit i left a hooded sweater and headphones in the room, rang straight away after leaving and was told they would be kept for me. On returning, the items were apparently never found. Reception staff were too interesting in texting on their phones than addressing my issue, two staff members grunted at me as we waited for airport transfers...not good enough. As expected, property was never returned. Breakfast was a nightmare...no seats and food was not re stocked after 9.15. When i asked for more bread and butter, i was greeted with a look of dismay from a staff member. Better off bringing breakfast back to your room. Room was fine as was cleanliness, just feel cheated out of my hard earned money. Would appreciate some sort of response to ronanperry@hotmail.com and would like to see some customer service in operation.

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service?”
Reviews.Author: BviTortola
Reviews.Content: Arrived at the airport, waited for shuttle about 30 min. no show, called the hotel four times only got useless answering machine, no live person. Finally took taxi $25.00 Complaining to the frontdesk clerk got me no where. Manager was not avaiable! In the morning, although breakfast was included, no juice or even cold water. Same attitude as night before.

Reviews.Title: “Was previously known as Fairfield Inn.I stay here on every trip to Miami”
Reviews.Author: Lesamel
Reviews.Content: From my 1st stay I have always been happy with the service. They have their own shuttle bus from and to the Airport which is nearby. I prefer a double room on the 1st (ground) floor with coffee/tea machine. Steam iron and ironing board in the room. TV and usual amenities There is a light breakfast included and waffle maker. Swimming pool, free parking, business facilities or you can have high speed internet in your room if you have your own Laptop. I find the location perfect but you must pre-book a car rental to get around. There are automatic washing machines and tumble dryers on the premises and ice machines. Lots of restaurants in the area, and very near the famous Doral Golf Club. I intend returning to this Hotel soon under the new name.

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER, DO NOT GO THERE”
Reviews.Author: Kate H
Reviews.Content: The room was disgusting, the carpet was dirty and the bathroom was not clean. The location is terrible, for someone who doesn't know it's hard to find specially if you get to miami during the night, the staff is not helpfull at all and won't take any suggestions such as cleaning the room, do not expect an amazing breakfast. DO NOT GO THERE, there are other hotels with this prize, next to the airport and much better.

Reviews.Title: “Goood Value & Friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: tickettapper
Reviews.Content: Spent 4 nites here due to canceled flight from hurricane in northeast. Spotted shuttle at MIA and got to hotel without even calling. Check-in took 2 minutes. Room amazingly clean and fresh looking. A/C worked great, bed and pillows made for a solid sleep. Nice clean and sparkling lobby. Best word to describe this facility is "Clean".

Reviews.Title: “A tranquil place to do both, bussines and relax”
Reviews.Author: TakFl
Reviews.Content: The place is very close to the airport and the Dolphin Mall. Room facilities are between average and good. But staff people is friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Not a great deal”
Reviews.Author: Jlv31
Reviews.Content: Average service, war at breakfast with people fighting around for food and seats. Otherwise if you are simply looking for a room for a night not far from the airport it's ok.

Reviews.Title: “Filthy”
Reviews.Author: H2Olvr
Reviews.Content: Nasty place. My son and I were sent here by American Airlines, they gave us a voucher because their flight from LAX was late so we missed the last flight out of MIA to get home. Waited over an hour for the shuttle, no answer at phone number. The person at their 800 number finally finds out- the bus is broken and another hotel's van is picking up for them. How were we supposed to know? No sign with Quality Inn on the van. Very limited toiletries available for us. ( no deodorant, or toothbrushes) The room was SO DIRTY. Our feet were black from walking barefoot on the rug. Dirty surfaces- counter, dresser top, night table. Little shampoo was half empty. Clock radio doesn't work, coffee maker -only 2 packs of decaf-never mind the coffee maker is dirty grimy and it doesn't work anyway. Squashed roach on the rug near the bathroom. Very dirty place.

Reviews.Title: “Great Accomodations”
Reviews.Author: connsimo7
Reviews.Content: We had an enjoyable stay at your hotel, the free breakfast above all of our expectations. You usually get coffe, juice, donuts, bagels, etc. It had all of that plus hot eggs, sausage, and homemade waffles. yum!

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Inn Miami Airport Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 3959 NW 79th Avenue, Miami, FL 33166 (Formerly Fairfield Inn Miami Airport West/Doral Area)
